General.barnahusInfoText: The chosen Barnahus is predetermined and cannot be changed. Practitioners can only be added to their associated Barnahus.
General.sectionAddedBelow: Your section has been added below
General.title: Title
General.searchMinInstructions: Enter minimum three characters for search
General.requiredFieldWarning: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory
General.emailSuccessfullyChangedDescription: To continue working please go to the dashboard.
General.pageNotFoundDescription: Page that are you looking for is not found, please go to the dashboard there you can see all the pages that you can go to.
General.cancelDescription: If you cancel, all your data <important>will be lost</important>, and you'll need to start over.
General.itemsSelectedMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no followers yet} =1 {# item selected} other {# items selected}}.
General.assignedBarnahusInfoText: Once the Barnahus is added it will be assigned to this Master-admin, and the information will appear here.
General.addBarnahusOnboardingDescription: To start working on a Barnahus, you need to add it first. By adding a Barnahus, you enable the assignment of a Master Admin who can manage and organize the necessary actions and assign personel within that Barnahus.
General.addMasterAdminOnboardingDescription: A Master-admin is responsible for maintaining the main dashboard and creating content for their respective Barnahus. Each Master-admin oversees their own Barnahus, with exclusive rights to invite other contributors to their Barnahus dashboard.

ValidationMeseges.password: Please make sure your password meets the criteria.
ValidationMeseges.confirmPassword: Please make sure your passwords match.
ValidationMeseges.phone: Invalid phone number. Please try again.

Onboarding.title: Hi, welcome to Journeys
Onboarding.description: To enhance your clarity regarding your responsibilities, follow these steps to determine your tasks more easily.

Languages.addContentLanguage: Add the languages that you will use to write the content in the app (Content language)
Languages.deleteInfo: A language can not be deleted if it has cases or if it is the default language.
Languages.noListDataDescription: In order to be able to populate the app with content about your Barnahus, you must first add the languages which you would like to use in the app. You can add as many languages as you want. There is also a possibility to enable auto-translation. If auto-translation is enabled for a language, you can quickly auto-translate the content that you have written for the default language. Always double check the auto-translation before publishing the content in the new language.
Languages.statusInfoText: The status of the added language will remain Inactive until the content has been generated in that language. This status will automatically shift to an active state once the content in that language is published.
Languages.autoTranslateInfoText: Auto-translation is enabled when the content has been published in the default language as the translation process relies on the default language as the source for translation.
Languages.deleteLanguageDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete language please press delete. But be aware that all content contected to that language <important>will be deleted!</important>

Authorization.passwordInstructions: Min 8 and max 24 characters, 1 number and 1 symbol
Authorization.invalidLogin: Your password and/or email are invalid. Try again.

ForgotPassword.instructions: Enter your account's email address and a link will be sent to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successInstructions2: , please go to that email address and click on link that will redirect you to page where you are going to reset your.
ForgotPassword.resendInstructions: If mail was not delivered please click resend after countdown.

PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.title: Password successfully changed
PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.instructions: Please login to your account again.

Barnahuses.successfullyCreated: The Barnahus has been added & the Master-admin has been invited.
Barnahuses.addBarnahusDescription: Please note that the new Barnahus will be the central hub for adding all personnel at that location, including an Admin for content management and practitioners for custom case journeys.
Barnahuses.deleteBarnahusesDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete Barnahus please press delete.
Barnahuses.assignedMasterAdminInfoText: Once the Master-admin for this Barnahus is added, their name will appear here.
Barnahuses.noListDataDescription: Add a Barnahus and assign a Master-admin

Admins.deleteAdminDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete admins please press delete.
Admins.noListDataDescription: You can add multiple Admins. The Admins will be in charge of overseeing content for the Barnahus and adding Practitioners.
Admins.addAdminDescription: Please note that <important>the Admin will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.
Admins.onboardingAddPractitionerDescription: As an Admin, you can add Practitioners to the dashboard, granting them the ability to add customized IDs (cases), and generate custom journeys for the children they serve. However, if you as the Admin will handle these tasks, you may skip this step, depending on your internal organization's decisions regarding dashboard access and rights sharing.

MasterAdmins.addAndAssignBarnahusDescription: Once you've added Master-admins, you'll need to add a Barnahus and assign each Master-admin to their respective Barnahus. Completing this process ensures that the Master-admins receives invitation and gains access to the app.
MasterAdmins.noListDataDescription: Add an Master-admin for every Barnahus you want to include. This individual will be in charge of overseeing content for that specific Barnahus and adding their Admins to it.
MasterAdmins.addMasterAdminDescription: Please note that the Master-admin <danger>will not receive an email invitation</danger> until you also add their Barnahus and assign it to this master-admin. Only then will they receive the invitation.
MasterAdmins.deleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: If you delete this Master-admin, they won't be able to access their profile anymore.
MasterAdmins.partialDeleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: some of the chosen Master-admins cannot be deleted because they have assigned Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.noDeleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: chosen Master-admins cannot be deleted because they have assigned Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.onboardingAddAdminDescription: If you're the sole captain, you manage all sections alone. Adding an Admin grants them almost identical rights to yours, enabling them to assist with main content setup.
MasterAdmins.onboardingAddPractitionerDescription: Adding a Practitioner allows limited access for case addition and customization of case journeys, as needed.
MasterAdmins.onboardingSetupAppContentDescription: Your main role is to populate content for the app, focusing on showcasing the Journeys experience for Barnahus children. The content you add will be previewed in the dashboard before being published for visibility in the app. You can select the language for content creation at the start or access the Languages section to view all available content languages.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateCustomiedIDDescription: Creating a customized ID initiates the process of crafting a personalized journey experience. This unique ID is only designated for this purpose and can be shared with the child if they wish to access the customized experience.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateTemplateDescription: Creating a template simplifies the process of building a Custom Journey by providing a predefined template. This template can be used as-is or further customized.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateCaseJourneyDescription: Creating a Custom Journey provides a final, presentational dashboard. This can be built from a template, which can be used as-is, further customized, or created entirely from scratch.

Practitioners.deletePractitionerDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete practitioners please press delete.
Practitioners.noListDataDescription: Here you will see a list of all the practitioners at your Barnahus. Practitioners have the mandate to create Custom-IDs, templates, and tailor journeys. However, they cannot add any new content, only use the existing content. You can add new practitioners as many practitioner as you like.
Practitioners.addPractitionerDescription: Please note that <important>the user will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.

ManageContent.selectContentDescription: You can make <guidelines>one content type per language</guidelines>. If you want the same content type in another language, create a new one and choose the language. <guidelines>Our software will translate it automatically,</guidelines> and you can adjust it as needed.
ManageContent.staffDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a short description about the Staff Member...
ManageContent.contentEditedDescription: Content has been successfully edited! If you wish to edit more, please choose a language from the dropdown and click the 'Edit more' button.
ManageContent.previewAndPublishContentDescription: Before publishing the content, please check how the content will look like in the Journeys app.
ManageContent.contentPublishedDescription: To create content in different languages, start by choosing the language you want to work with.
ManageContent.addAboutInfoText: Add more sections if you would like to tailor the language to different age groups. You can decide later which one you would like to show for the user.
ManageContent.addRoomInfoText: Add more rooms if need to, later you can remove them if you don't need them.
ManageContent.addStaffInfoText: Add more staff if need to, later you can remove them if you don't need them.
ManageContent.waitingRoomTitlePlaceholder: Write the title of the room...
ManageContent.waitingRoomDescriptionPlaceholder: Write what the child can expect in the Waiting room...
ManageContent.selectLanguageDescription: Choose the language you will use to write the content.
ManageContent.description: In this section, Admins must provide detailed Barnahus information. Once entered, practitioners can choose what to display based on the case type.
ManageContent.noListDataDescription: In this section, you can add information about your specific Barnahus. There will be an oppurtunity to create multiple sections with similar content. This is to ensure that you can have, for example, three descriptions of your Barnahus, tailored to different age groups. When creating a journey, you decide which content from this section will be shown to the user.
ManageContent.generalIntroductionPlaceholderTitle: Write the title of this section...
ManageContent.deleteContentDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete content please press delete. But be aware that you are going to <important>delete content in all languages.</important>
ManageContent.addAndReviewNewContentDescription: Since the language is auto-translated, review the translated content before publishing.
ManageContent.contentNotAddedInDefaultLanguageTitle: Content not added in default language
ManageContent.contentNotAddedInDefaultLanguageDescript: To add content in auto-translate language you need to add content in default language first from which it can be auto-translated. To add content in default language click on button below.
ManageContent.addPhotoInfo: Photos are not tied to any specific language, so they remain the same across all languages.
ManageContent.publishedDescription: You sucessfully created {section} in all published languages. If you want to create another {section}, click on the button below.
ManageContent.noContentToBePublishedDescription: There is no content added so there is nothing to publish. If you want to publish go back and create content and then publish it.
ManageContent.contentNotAddedDescription: Since this language is not added, feel free to enter the content in order to publish the selected language.
ManageContent.addAboutDescription: To add new about, start by adding content in the default language. The system will automatically translate it to other languages. Ensure you review all content before saving and publishing.
ManageContent.editAboutDescription: Edit the about in the default language; it will auto-translate to others. Review before saving. Consistently apply edits in default language to maintain mobile app consistency across all languages.
ManageContent.addRoomDescription: To add new room, start by adding content in the default language. The system will automatically translate it to other languages. Ensure you review all content before saving and publishing.
ManageContent.addRoomsDescription: To add new room, start by adding content in the default language. The system will automatically translate it to other languages. Ensure you review all content before saving and publishing.
ManageContent.editRoomDescription: When you edit the room in the default language. it will automatically translate into other languages. Review the translation before saving. Always make edits in the default language to ensure consistency across all languages.
ManageContent.addStaffDescription: To add new staff, add content in the default language. The system will automatically translate it to other languages. Review all the content before saving and publishing.
ManageContent.editStaffDescription: Edit the staff in the default language; it will auto-translate to others. Review before saving. Consistently apply edits in default language to maintain mobile app consistency across all languages.

CaseFiles.customizedIdInfoText: Choose an appropriate Custom ID for the User.
CaseFiles.noListDataDescription: To create a personalised journey for a child, you must first generate a unique ID (Custom-ID). The first step when setting up a journey is to link it to this ID, and so you need to have the ID before you create a journey. This ID will also serve as the code that children use the first time they log in to their journey. There is no limit to the number of Custom-IDs you can create.
CaseFiles.barnahusInfoText: The Barnahus cannot be changed. Admins can only be added to their associated Barnahus.
CaseFiles.deleteCaseFileDescription: If you are certain that you want to delete Custom ID please press delete.
CaseFiles.addCaserDescription: When adding a new Custom ID, you can utilize the created Custom ID to design a customized journey specifically tailored to it.
CaseFiles.notesInfoText: Turning on notes allows the child to add comments about their journey.

CaseJourney.selectCustomIdDescription: To customise a Journey, please enter the Custom ID which you'd like to create Journey for. You will then be able to choose the content you will like to show for the user by selecting it.
CaseJourney.noContentDescription: There is no content in this section to pick from
CaseJourney.enableNotesDescription: Turning on notes allows the child to add comments about their journey.. If you want to disable them later, you can do that as well.
CaseJourney.setCasePasswordDescription: A password is set so the journey will be protected and private, ensuring it is maximally personalized for the user.
CaseJourney.selectBarnahusContentDescription: Pick the content you want for the customised journey.
CaseJourney.selectRoomsContentDescription: Pick the content you want for the customised journey.
CaseJourney.selectStaffContentDescription: Pick the content you want for the customised journey.
CaseJourney.dragToRearrangeDescription: Rearrange the rooms so that it suits the child's journey. You can delete any irrelevant rooms that the child will not visit.
CaseJourney.caseJourneySavedDescription: Now that you've created a Custom Journey, you can use it inside mobile app.
CaseJourney.chooseCaseJourneyTypeCreationTitle: Choose your way of creating Custom Journey
CaseJourney.chooseCaseJourneyTypeCreationDescription: You can either create a Custom Journey from a template, which includes pre-selected data from content, or custom Custom Journey from the full content.
CaseJourney.selectTemplateDescription: Please select template so you can create Custom Journey from it.
CaseJourney.chooseCreateFromTemplateTypeTitle: Choose a way you want to use template
CaseJourney.chooseCreateFromTemplateTypeDescription: You can either use ready-made template that has already customized content or you can customized it even further and make it more case specific.
CaseJourney.noListDataDescription: By creating a Custom Journey, you will produce the final product of the Journeys dashboard, which will be visible in the mobile application to all users with access.

Settings.emailInstructions: You must verify your new email before you can use it to log-in
Settings.emailVerificationDialogDescription: To start using your new email, just verify the updated address as your new login. After confirming, log in again to update the email in your settings.

Templates.name: Template name
Templates.nameDescription: To easily recognize the template, please choose a name that is most suitable and descriptive for the template you are going to create.
Templates.selectTemplateDescription: To create case from template, please choose or search for the desired template that suits your case best and modify it by your needs.
Templates.previewAndSaveContentDescription: Before saving the template, please check how the content of template will look like in the Journeys app.
Templates.templateSavedDescription: Now that you've created a template, you can easily use it to create case journeys.
Templates.noContentPublishedDescription: To create templates, you need existing content about your Barnahus. Since there's no content yet, you cannot create a template. Please add some content,  or ask an Admin to add some content, and then return to this tab to create templates.
Templates.noListDataDescription: To be able to create case journeys with ease whenever there is a need for it, you must first create a template. Start creating your first template by pressing the button below.
Templates.deleteTemplateDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete template please press delete.
Templates.isGeneralDescription: If the template is general, it will be open for all to see. If it is not, it will be for a specific user and password protected.
